pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.5: Ime kho panāyasmanto terasa saṃghādisesā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.3: So tena kiso hoti lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.4: Addasa kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ kisaṃ lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṃ dhamanisanthatagattaṃ. Disvāna āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.5: “kissa tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.6: Kacci no tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.8: “Tena hi tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, yāvadatthaṃ bhuñja yāvadatthaṃ supa yāvadatthaṃ nhāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.9: Yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṃ supitvā yāvadatthaṃ nhāyitvā yadā te anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.10: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, kappati evarūpaṃ kātun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.12: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako yāvadatthaṃ bhuñji yāvadatthaṃ supi yāvadatthaṃ nhāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.13: Yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṃ supitvā yāvadatthaṃ nhāyitvā yadā anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.14: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako aparena samayena vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.15: Atha kho āyasmato seyyasakassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.16: “pubbe kho tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.17: So dāni tvaṃ etarahi vaṇṇavā pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.18: Kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, bhesajjaṃ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.20: Api cāhaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjāmi yāvadatthaṃ supāmi yāvadatthaṃ nhāyāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.21: Yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṃ supitvā yāvadatthaṃ nhāyitvā yadā me anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.1: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, āvuso seyyasaka, yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjasi teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.3: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.4: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.7: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, seyyasaka, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.10: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.11: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.12: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.15: Tattha nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi, visaññogāya dhamme desite saññogāya cetessasi, anupādānāya dhamme desite saupādānāya cetessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.16: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena rāgavirāgāya dhammo desito, madanimmadanāya pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭupacchedāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammo desito?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.17: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ akkhātaṃ, kāmasaññānaṃ pariññā akkhātā, kāmapipāsānaṃ paṭivinayo akkhāto, kāmavitakkānaṃ samugghāto akkhāto, kāmapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.18: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.19: Atha khvetaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānañceva appasādāya, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.20: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ seyyasakaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.21: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.23: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā niddaṃ okkamanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.2: Tesaṃ muṭṭhassatīnaṃ asampajānānaṃ niddaṃ okkamantānaṃ supinantena asuci muccati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.8: Kacci nu kho mayaṃ saṃghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.5: nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ takkavaṇṇaṃ dakavaṇṇaṃ telavaṇṇaṃ khīravaṇṇaṃ dadhivaṇṇaṃ sappivaṇṇaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.11: saṃghova tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṃ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, mānattaṃ deti, abbheti; na sambahulā, na ekapuggalo. Tena vuccati—“saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.12: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenapi vuccati—“saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.2.36: nīlaṃ bhavissati, pītakaṃ bhavissati, lohitakaṃ bhavissati, odātaṃ bhavissati, takkavaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, dakavaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, telavaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, khīravaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, dadhivaṇṇaṃ bhavissati, sappivaṇṇaṃ bhavissatīti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.1: Ajjhattarūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.8.1: Nīlaṃ mocessāmīti ceteti upakkamati pītakaṃ muccati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno supinantena asuci mucci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.3: “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, kacci nu kho ahaṃ saṃghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno uccāraṃ karontassa asuci mucci.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.2.6: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno passāvaṃ karontassa asuci mucci.
